statements: UPDATE meeting_records SET duration = 60 WHERE recording_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE meeting_records SET duration = 60 WHERE recording_id = 'c649ab77-8b0f-4d63-819b-ae3a4ced12d9';

UPDATE meeting_recordings SET duration_minutes = 60 WHERE recording_id = 1;
UPDATE meeting_transcripts SET processed = true WHERE transcript_id = 2;
UPDATE meeting_recordings SET duration_minutes = 60, meeting_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE recording_id = 1;
UPDATE meeting_transcripts SET transcript_text = 'The meeting was very productive.', processed = TRUE WHERE transcript_id = 2;
UPDATE recordings SET recording_url='updated_url_1', duration_minutes=120 WHERE meeting_id=101;
UPDATE transcripts SET transcript_text='Updated transcript text', transcript_created='2022-01-25 09:00:00' WHERE transcript_id=201;
UPDATE recordings SET duration_minutes = 120, recording_url = 'https://example.com/recording1' WHERE meeting_id = 101
UPDATE transcripts SET transcript_text = 'Updated transcript text', transcript_created = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transcript_id = 201
UPDATE meetings SET meeting_topic = 'Project Update Meeting' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
UPDATE attendees SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', JOINING_DATE = '2022-01-15' WHERE attendee_id = 2;
UPDATE meetings SET recording_url = 'http://new-recording-url.com' WHERE meeting_id = 1;
